channel.title: Help starting a Moparscape private server
channel.description:
I have very minimal programing experience, most I can do is python, so I really need help with this. I've been trying to log into servers since I downloaded the client today, and I am having no luck. I can't even get into one that I supposedly create for my self (create server option). It either says the server is down or I'm already logged in. Well that can't be because I haven't been able to log in yet.
What should I do, because I have no clue.
Oh, btw, my system is a 64 bit windows 7. Don't know if that changes anything, but just in case it does.
EDIT:I have reinstalled Java, restarted my computer, redownloaded moparscape twice, and I have gotten the same error that i'm either logged in already or that the server is down. Please help, I really would like to play this. EDIT: I still can't get it to run ANY server. I've used ones from moparscapes list of online servers, and it doesn't work at all, just says I'm already logged in.

item.title: Help starting a Moparscape private server
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

Make sure that the server itself is running, not just the client. Also make sure that your client ip is set to localhost, or 127.0.0.1.

Read full topic
item.source: Help starting a Moparscape private server
